name: CropWatch® Air Temperature & Humidity Sensor
tagline: Accurate, reliable monitoring of temperature and humidity for various environments
description: The CropWatch® Air Temperature & Humidity Sensor is designed for precise environmental monitoring in agricultural, industrial, and commercial settings. This durable sensor provides real-time data on temperature and humidity conditions, helping you maintain optimal environments for crops, inventory, and equipment. With long battery life and robust design, it's the perfect solution for your environmental monitoring needs.
features: Low power consumption with long battery life
Compatible with CropWatch® dashboard and mobile app
